description: File defining an FNF freeplay style usable by the freeplay.

version.description: The version number for the Freeplay style data file format.

bgAsset.description: Asset key for the image used as a background.

selectorAsset.description: Asset key used by the difficulty arrows in the top-left corner of freeplay.

numbersAsset.description: Asset key for the song highscore numbers shown at the top right of the freeplay.

capsuleAsset.description: Asset key for the freeplay capsules.

capsuleTextColors.description: Color data for the capsule text outline. The order goes as follows: [DESELECTED, SELECTED]

startDelay.description: Delay time after confirming a song selection, before entering PlayState.
